title: victorious skin
body:
we all know that the victorious skin is something that we all aim for at the end of the season (at least i know i am). whether you did it with a duo partner or solo, it is quite an achievement. anyone have any speculations on who it is going to be for. its normally for the most influential champions in the game and my guess would be nidalee. things have taken quite a turn with her ever since her jg buff and i c her almost every game.
who do u think its going to be for?

replies.body: VICTORIOUS QUINN 10/10 WOULD BUY OR GRIND FOR. GOLDEN VALOR OP

**YES!!! WE NEED TO MAKE QUINN STAND OUT THIS SEASON!!!**

No idea how we're going to do it though...
I have an idea, we find a game breaking bug with every Adc but Quinn, so for a while the only Adc people can play is Quinn and our plan will have all come together.
dude i played with you in a aram match, i just saw your name and i had to comment. RLG Shaky, i was the Vladamir and you were caitlyn and you didn't help..
says the guy that didnt stop complaining and kept whinging because i "didnt die enough"

i never said you didn't die enough, i said you weren't coming in to help inn team fights, and your caitlyn ults were horse crap, you barely helped, my mates weren't any better but they at least helped and did something rather then waiting till we all died and then got piled on
it was ARAM? u think i care lol?
relax dude, we can all be friends

well so far we have: Jarvan iv = top/jung, Janna = supp, Morgana= mid, Elise = jung/top. So guessing it's going to be an adc of some sort, usually one that has alot of impact in the year, so I'm guessing Graves/Trist/Jinx
morg is a support.. (in the relavent season)

its only the start of the season....no champion has stood out enough in the season for it to be them....

wait 3-4 months AND THEN speculate.

nid went popular from end of last season all through the preseason. so not really a stand out THIS season.
similar reason why lee sin will NEVER get a victorious skin, maybe a championship skin, but not a vict.
viktor and kennen resurgence is ridiculous ATM so i'd like to think it would be one of them
